Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to directing any moneys derived from new or increased taxes to reduce local real property taxes
Summary: Directs any moneys derived from new or increased taxes be used to reduce local real property taxes.
LawCode: Amd ยง171-a, Tax L; add ยง54-n, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to disposition of revenue from new taxes and tax increases to reduce local real property tax levies
